name: UIDocumentMenuDelegate
desc: A set of methods that you must implement to track user interactions with a document menu view controller.

items.name: func documentMenu(UIDocumentMenuViewController, didPickDocumentPicker: UIDocumentPickerViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user has selected a document picker from the menu.

items.name: func documentMenuWasCancelled(UIDocumentMenuViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user dismissed the document menu.
